text:
Mere Bhai, 
Pichhle janam me mene puny kiye honge tabhi mujhe Arnav jaisa baapu aur tere jaisa bhai mila. Hum toh asli wale bhai hai, ek-ek baat likhunga toh word limit exceed ho jaayegi. Apn toh shuru se hi contact me the. Tu wing me age-wise sabse chhota hoga, par tumse mature puri wing me koi nahi hai. Tumne mere har kand me mujhe guide kiya, aur meri low time me mujhe sambhala. Tum nahi hote toh me puri tarah se fucked-up ho jata. Fir mere liye shayad sambhlna bahot muskil hota. Bandi wali meri irritating baato ko bahot saha tune, par time pe sahi rasta dikha diya. Tumhari itni importance hai ki, agar jab bhi koi kand hota tha mere sath sabse phle tum dimag me aate the. Tumne sare bhaiyon ki bahot help ki hai. 
Tum khub tarakki karo, taki hum proud se bol sake yah mera bhai tha clg me. Banglore jaa hi rahe apn, mulakatein rukni nahi chahiye.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Hey bro, 
Extremely extrovert bande ho wing me. You have a way with girls. kabhi fursat me tips de dena. Kabhi kabhi thodi-bahot kaha suni ho jati thi apni ground me. Kyunki  tu sala bhtta fenkta haiüòù. Jokes apart, jnha pyar hai wnha thode jagde ho hi jate hai. Socially activeness aur tumhara friendly behavious bahot lajawab hai. I wish ki kuch sath me pics hoti final-photoshoot me, par tum toh aaye hi nahi clg. Milte hai jaldi aur tab thodi tips de dena. Take care
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Adi mere Bhai, 
Tum apni Kundli check karwao yar. Tumhe kaafi baar, jitna tum truly derserve karte ho usse kam milta hai. 
You are one of few friends whom I talk with very frequently on voice calls. The very first solid memory I could remember is the tutorials of ESO204A. 
Then Kaldi comes. Itne muskil se prof ke under project mila tha. Project ke kaam se jyada toh hum Nikhil aur Hegde ko gaali nikalte the üòÇ. Sorry yar, tumhe hospital bhej diya mene. Tumse Football sikhna baaki rah gaya bas. Mujhe aaj tak samjh nahi aaya tumhe "Dark" kyu pasand nahi aayi. 
Remember NoFap challenge, Tumne bahot samose khilaye. 
"\bPra\S+" (RegEx) Gurgaon me hi hai. Vmock me uska dhyaan rakhna yar aur help karte rahna. Jeevan bhr mujhe movies, series wagerah bhi suggest karte rahna.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text: I still remember when we discussed that we both have almost the same CPI and we had the same SPI target for the next sem also. And again we got a similar fucked up SPI.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

Yo Bahubali,
Tum bahot badhiya insaan ho yar. Jeevan me itne sare regrets me ek yah bhi hai ki tumse 1st year me itna contact me nahi tha. But over the course of time, tumhe jaanne laga, aur tumhe bhi mouka diya hume janne kaüòÇ.
Eventually, we are good friends and sadiyon tak rahenge. Ek baat toh tumhare baare me jaani, tumhe mucho wale insaan kaafi acche lagte, chahe ladke ho (Puma) ya ladki (You know who). 
Tumhe bhnd dekhkar, ek kasam kha li thi, sala itna bhnd nahi hona kabhi. Par ush time tumhari baate sunkar, pata chla kitne pyare insaan ho tum <3. Rahi cricket ki baat, hopefully jeevan me tumse out hone (ya six lagane) ka chance milta rahe. 
Tumhari company paakr koi bhi insaan dhny ho jaaye. Aur yahi hum chahte hai, call karte rahna.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Hi Mote!
Ab bhakt kya hi likhe bhagwan ke baare me. Sabse playful insaan ho tum puri wing me. Tum mote bhle hi ho, par dil se ekdm chhote se bachhe ho. Jab koi kaam kar rahe hote ho tab super-serious and baki time ekdm childish behaviour. Tumhara dil bahot saaf hai. Tumne meri bahot help ki hai. Profs ko RR wale mail tumse behtar koi likh hi nahi sakta xd. Interview tips, coding bugs/silly mistakes, company life, bandi ke baare me, etc kaafi sari helpful discussions mei bhul nahi sakta. You are the person that everyone wants to be with, no matter wherever you go. 
Jis tarah se tum sabki care karte ho, I wish mei tumhara chhota bhai hota, par I am sure chhote bhai se kam bhi nahi hun. Tumhe irritate karne se alag hi satisfaction milta hai mujhe.
Sach batau, tumse jagda karke bahot jyada bura laga tha. Roj man karta tha ki tumse baat karke sorry bol dun. Abhi apn kabhi ladai nahi karenge, thik hai?
Bhulna mat tumhe mess me kadak roti/paratha/dosa lena mene sikhaya xD. Aur bhi bahot sari chhoti moti yaadgar baatein hai. Aur han, badminton sikh raha hun, apn team banate rahenge, aur sabko hara denge.
Jeevan me humari care karte rahna. Yaad rakhne me tumhe efforts lagne nahi wale hai, kyuki mei bhulne nahi dene wala. <3
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text: LIF101 me tution ke liye thanks. Tum running bahot acchi karte ho. Unfortunately, IITK me last exam sath nahi de paye.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Hare Krishna, Hare Rama, Krishna Krishna, Rama Rama
Prasad bahot tasty hota tha bro.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text: Bro tum the sath me, isliye Civil thik thak nikal gayi. Core ho ya non-core sab jagah machate ho tum. Tumhara friendly behaviors and generous nature bahot yaad aata hai. Civil me hokar bhi gazab ki coding tumhari. Tumhari wajah se hi mujhe Civil me jyada se jyada fraud marne ka mouka milaüòÖ. Sari lab-reports, assignments, course me helps ke liye dil se thanku yar. Bahot bada aadmi banega tu. Milte hai jaldi, aur bhulna toh bilkul matüòù. Chlo, take care
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Hey Ashu, 
Teri drawings ka mei fan hun yar. Teri drawings, wall paintings me apne ghar par aur apne friends ko dikhata tha. Mene tumne ek baar Pari bola, bahot peeta tuneü•¥.
Fortunately, tumhari kick nahi padi ab tak. Bahot talented person ho tum, basketball, onu werewolf, badminton, sab game bahot acche khelte ho. Bahot hi shy aur pyare insaan ho tum. Ish bhai ko bhulna mat. Take care!
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text: Chaapu londe, Thode aur courses me group partner hote toh jyada fraud maar pata mei, Tumse CE me dasse lane ka motivation toh mila par aaya kabhi nahi yar.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text: Tere kapde dhul jaye toh message kar dena bhai
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Hentaish, 
Tu bhnd hi raha kar, fir slow bolta haiüòù. Sabse khushmizaz rahne wala banda hai tu. Apn ka toh khoon(iitk wala) ka rishta hai. Maze aaye par tumhari company me. Tum sath the isliye Civil itni bhi boring nahi lagi. Tum Aero club me night out maar ke mehnat bahot karte the. Cricket me bahot enjoy kiya sath me. Make sure, Bhabhi IITK ki hi honi chahiyeüòù.
Aur han hume tumse English sunne ka mouka milta rahna chahiye. 
Take care
author: Prashant  Chouhan

Hen**ish Bro,

Tum sath the isliye Civil itni bhi boring nahi lagi. Tum Aero club me night out maar ke mehnat bahot karte the. Cricket me bahot enjoy kiya sath me. Make sure, Bhabhi IITK ki hi honi chahiyeüòù.
Aur han hume tumse English sunne ka mouka milta rahna chahiye.

text:
Bro, Teri communication skills ka toh mei fun hun. Maze aaye yar tumhari company me. Jab bhi milta tha meri tarif karta tha, par mujhse toh kaafi jyada chaapu ho tum. Social interaction karna tumse sikhe koi. Munmum ke course me bhi har time sath bethte the aur ek-dusre ki copy me dekhte the, ki knhi isme kuch jyada toh nahi likh diya. 
Stay connected and milte hai jaldi, bhulna toh bilkul mat.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Bade Bhai!
Shuru shuru me tu mujhe bahot khatarnaak lagta tha. Me sochta tha ki isse acchi bana ke rakhta hun. Ladai-jagda ho gaya toh kaam aayegaü§£.
Fir jab dheere dheere janne laga toh sahi me khatarnaak nikla. Sabki leta tha. Bahot strong personlity hai tumhari. Tune sabko training di, thodi bahot humne bhi li. Tu nahi hota toh aadhi wing chomu hi rah jati. Tu caring bhi kaafi hai, aur mene toh bahot sari tips li hai tumse. Mera toh first course group bhi tere sath tha ART105. Bahot maze aaye the acting karke.
Me kabhi kabhi tumse hathapai pe aa jata tha, par tum tagde hote hue bhi mujhe chhota bhai samjh ke shant ho jate the.  Apn ne sath me bahot cricket khela. Me abhi bhi manta hun ki tum bhtte fenke hoüòù. Par bahot enjoy kiya.  Me horror movie dekhte hue bas ek baar dara hun, jab tumne mere piche khde hokar daraya tha, Gote muh me aa gaye the.
Quarantine ke chkkr me final photo-shoot me apni sath me ek bhi photo nahi hai. Par tumse jaldi mil hi jaaunga bangalore me, aur fir bakchodiyan karenge.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Hi Nimish,
Mujhe yaad hai apna first interaction CC me hua tha. Me apne ESC101 ke end-sem marks dekh raha tha. Me sample test-case pass karwake thode bahot marks laya tha, fir bhi khus tha. Tum aage bethe the, pucha tere kitne aaye, mene dekha sabme full. Fir pata chla alag level hai bhai ka. 
Civil me toh apan ne sath me fraud mara hi hai. Fir ML course me bhi bahot discussion hua apna. Tumse me bahot inspire hua hun. Civil me hokar, programming me itna jyada chapna, aur tumhari communication skills bakchod hai. I hope kabhi kisi cheez me apan collab kar paye. Stay connected bro, bhul mat jana.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Paramveer! 
Agar free hai toh cricket khelne chle kya. Yah line apn ne aapas me kaafi baar boli hai. Yaad hai, ek din basketball court me continuously har ball par out kar raha tha. Tu puchhta rahta tha ki Prashant meri bowling fast toh aa rahi hai na.  Apn ne first baari proper baat CC me ki thi. We were preparing for PHY102 endSem. Tum wing me sabse kam fraud maarne wale bande ho. tumse mujhe sincerity aur hardwork karne ka motivation milta hai. Tum last me clg nahi aa paye the aur tumhe humne kaafi miss kiya tha (especially Sarthak ne). NoFap challenge and samosa treat was really fun, nahi? Aage baat karte rahna and I hope jaldi ek trip karenge.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Hey Riya!
Ekdm end me, ML group me tumse baat hui. Tum next presentation schedule ka screenshot le leti thi üòÖ. Kyuki knhi dobara suffling karne par tumhara naam na aa jaye. Fir ekdm hum ish par argue karne lag gaye the ki CE451A me tum ho, tumhe pata nahi hai, mene tumhe doubt puchhte hue suna hai. Tumse ML project aur assignment2 me kaafi discussion hua. And I get to know that you are such a friendly person. Best part yah tha presentation me voice-over tumhara nahi, tumahri sister ka tha.
I wish I could be in your contact from the first year itself. Now we will stay connected in the future, thik hai? Take care, Keep smiling.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Yo Panda!üêº,
Tere bina koi course karne me maza hi nahi aata bhai. Fraud bahot maarte ho par chapte usse jyada ho. Tere decisions perfect hote hai, isliye me khud se jyada teri baato me confident rahta hun. Humesha lagta the ki yah course toh Panda sambhal lega. Yaad hai na almost har course me yahi bolte the ki method me batata hun, tum calculate kar lena fatafat.
Apne sare assignments ditto same hote the. 
Tumhari logical reasoning ka toh mei fan hun. Tumhe har cheez ki knowledge hai. Tumse mujhe bahot jyada sikhne ko mila aur humesha sikhta rahunga. 
Market me investing aur in-general sari cheezo me help karte rahna. Milte hai jaldi...
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Hey Tech savvy, 
Tumhare dialogues ka fan hun me. Kya innovation and creative hote hai tumhare punch. Itna daring ho ki senior ko hi kholne ka bol diya. Electronic gadgets ko kholne ki tumhari curiosity alag level ki hoti hai. Tumhara friendly behavior bahot accha lagta hai, kisi baat ka bura nahi manta. Mast hai yar tu. All the best for the future.
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Hey best friend, I am wondering where to start. You are undoubtedly the person whom I conveyed the most number of lines in terms of conversation at IITK. I can hardly remember any conversation between us in the first half. But when I get to know you personally, I became an admirer of your simplicity, brilliancy, lowliness, generosity, and sense of humor. You have a big brain and a big kind heart at the same time, which is very rare.
I am damn sure that you know me better than any other person does. We had many Bakchodis together. Listing them down would require a whole book in itself. You motivated me in every possible way. You shared some of your not-so-dark secrets with me, and I could not find any secret element in them xD.
You canceled your Goa trip because some of your close friends, including me, were not going. I was so overwhelmed knowing this. We have completed almost two years of friendship without turning the back on, no more than zero times, which is very infrequent in my case.
We always believe deep inside our heart (or brain) that it happens exactly opposite to whatever you say. And that was the reason you always underestimated yourself. Bro, You are nailing everything.
You are such a helpful person that, despite your PPO, we were preparing every day for (my) placements. Thanks for everything.
I saw you closely pine for someone in love. It proves that you would be a great lover if given a chance. Tu ladkiyon se baat kar toh sahi.
I hope we will keep creating the PRs together on GitHub for every bug we see in life (whether open-source or not)  üòÇ
author: Prashant  Chouhan

text:
Yo bro, 
Bhar bhar ke cheating ki apan ne courses me.  Bahot funny insaan hai tu. Jitna chill normal time me rahta hai, usse knhi jyada teri exam time me fati rahti hai. Kuch logo ki wajah se (including you) Civil itna bhi boring nahi laga mujhe. Jab bhi mile, tumhari company bahot enjoy kari hai mene. 
Mujhe yaad hai placements se phle, apni baat hui thi, tu bola bhai tere mast placement hoga, tu tension na le. Bahot accha laga mujhe, Confidence boost hua tha. Thanks bhai, mujhe confident feel karwane ke liye aur jab bhi baat karte meri taarif karne ke liyeüòù.
I am sure apn ki bahot frequently baat hone wali hai. Jaldi mitle hai.
author: Prashant  Chouhan
